title: New iKern site
content:
Hello. I've just updated the iKern site [www.ikern.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203024836/http:/www.ikern.com/ "www.ikern.com"). I also added a page where I talk about some of the principles. Hope somebody likes it.

Igino Marini
author: iginomarini

comments.content: Thank you, Igino. It's really remarkable what you are doing, and it makes for great reading. I only wish I could learn even more about iKern and the principles behind it.

Very interesting project/service. Thank you, Igino.

-----------------------  
Michael Browers  
 [www.michaelbrowers.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203024836/http:/www.michaelbrowers.com/ "www.michaelbrowers.com")
